      • getVersion

        public String getVersion()
        Specified by:
        getVersion in interface TTSService
        Returns:
        the version or type (binary, in-memory) of the TTS service. Used only for printing information. Must be thread-safe.

      • loadSSMLadapter

        protected void loadSSMLadapter(String resource,
                               Class<?> context)
        Parameters:
        resource - Path to the SSML adapter XSLT within the bundle
        context - A class contained in the same bundle as the SSML adapter XSLT

      • getSSMLxslTransformerURL

        public URL getSSMLxslTransformerURL()
        Description copied from interface: TTSService
        Must be thread safe.
        Specified by:
        getSSMLxslTransformerURL in interface TTSService
        Returns:
        the URL of the XSLT stylesheet to use for transforming SSML into plain strings, in whatever syntax the TTS processor takes as input.

        If the TTS processor does not add any extra ending pauses, the XSLT should produce a silent break at the end (around 250ms). It should also add an ending SSML mark if it can handle it. The XSLT must take as parameters an optional voice name and an ending-mark.

        May be null in which case the SSML is not transformed, and the sentence argument that is passed to TTSEngine.synthesize(java.lang.String, net.sf.saxon.s9api.XdmNode, org.daisy.pipeline.tts.Voice, org.daisy.pipeline.tts.TTSRegistry.TTSResource, java.util.List<org.daisy.pipeline.tts.TTSService.Mark>, java.util.List<java.lang.String>, org.daisy.pipeline.tts.AudioBufferAllocator, boolean) will be null.
